channel.title: GUI help
channel.description:
Hello, I'm new to swing here, and I'm using neub35's GUI maker, does anyone have a tutorial on GUI's? If so, give me the link please.
I need help on this as well,
- How do I run a GUI when it's saved as .java and after it's compiled? - How do I make a button actually do something
thanks everyone who helps

item.title: GUI help
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

you run it same way as you run any other class but you have to make the GUI show with JFrame.setVisible(true);

tutorial : http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/

Read full topic
